-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | conduit-audio interface to the libsndfile audio file library
--   
@package conduit-audio-sndfile
@version 0.1

module Data.Conduit.Audio.Sndfile

-- | Uses <tt>libsndfile</tt> to load an audio file as a stream.
sourceSnd :: (MonadResource m, Sample a) => FilePath -> IO (AudioSource m a)
sourceSndFrom :: (MonadResource m, Sample a) => Duration -> FilePath -> IO (AudioSource m a)

-- | Uses <tt>libsndfile</tt> to write an audio stream to a file.
sinkSnd :: (MonadResource m, Sample a) => FilePath -> Format -> AudioSource m a -> m ()
